alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 5:21PM CDT until November 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR WESTERN BENTON AND NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 520 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Cincinnati, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Lowell... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Highfill... Springtown... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Centerton... Elm Springs... Fairmount... Vaughn... Savoy... Healing Springs... Wedington... Gallitin... Rhea... Rocky Comfort... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 73 and 83. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
